mapper.select: SELECT s.id_seller as idSeller, s.id_person as idPerson, s.id_user as idUser, u.password as password, u.email as email, p.first_name as firstName, p.last_name as lastName, p.phone_number as phoneNumber, s.image_path as imagePath FROM seller s INNER JOIN user u on s.id_user=u.id_user INNER JOIN person p on s.id_person=p.id_person WHERE s.id_user = 2

SELECT id_publication as idSeller, image_path as imagePath, titulo as titulo, price as price FROM publication INNER JOIN seller on publication.id_seller=seller.id_seller INNER JOIN user on seller.id_user=user.id_user INNER JOIN image_publication image_publication.id_publication=publication.id_publication WHERE user.id_user = #{idUsuario} LIMIT 1;
